overview: In a world of luxury and seduction, these six beautiful married women are ready and willing to do anything to satisfy the debauched and voyeuristic fantasies of their husbands. Offering themselves to strangers under the perverted gaze of their husbands, they are about to discover new heights of pleasure. Without doubt, forbidden fruit tastes even better when shared...  Earlier in the day, this amazing redhead sucked off a stranger until he came in her mouth, and her husband didn't miss a second of this tantalising performance. On returning to the house, she is delighted to discover that he has never been so aroused, and he intends to make her come like never before...
tagline: When infidelity becomes a game, nothing is out of bounds
title: Luxure: Wives to Share
